description:
Seeking to reclaim three years’ worth of unused vacation time, Akira spends his days being lazy, day drinking and ignoring the chaos happening in the world. Unfortunately, he’s down to his last beer. He evades zombies and runs into a mysterious woman.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La liste de souhaits de la mort
バケットリスト オブ ザ デッド
